location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch map shewing communications between KERMAN and SAIDABAD.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 145 x 95mm, on sheet 175 x 115mm

mods.abstract: The map is a General Staff India publication marked for official use only, and accompanies MILITARY REPORT on PERSIA Vol. IV Part I. The map shows a region of southern and eastern Persia, indicating roads, paths and heliograph transmitters between Kerman and Saidabad [Sirjan].The map bears a printing statement which reads 'Simla Drawing Office. No. 3255, March 1922.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
